sqlMap.select: /* calendar.findAllLang */ SELECT CALENDAR_ID, LANG_KND, NAME, COMMENTS, INS_DATIM, UPD_DATIM FROM CALENDAR_LANG WHERE CALENDAR_ID=#calendarId#
/* calendar.lang.detail */ SELECT CALENDAR_ID, LANG_KND, NAME, COMMENTS, INS_DATIM, UPD_DATIM FROM CALENDAR_LANG WHERE CALENDAR_ID=#calendarId# AND LANG_KND=#langKnd#
sqlMap.update: /* calendar.lang.update */ UPDATE CALENDAR_LANG SET NAME=#name#, COMMENTS=#comments#, UPD_DATIM=SYSDATE WHERE CALENDAR_ID=#calendarId# LANG_KND=#langKnd#
sqlMap.delete: /* calendar.lang.delete */ DELETE FROM CALENDAR_LANG WHERE CALENDAR_ID=#calendarId# LANG_KND=#langKnd#
